abstract.para: Phoronida Database is a taxonomic database of horseshoe worms species and higher taxon names, including fossil species. Diagnoses and distribution maps of the species and genus are being updated gradually. Exhaustive bibliography is provided. Database is closely related to the web portal http://paleopolis.rediris.es/Phoronida/. Data are contributed to the Catalogue of Life via paleopolis.rediris web portal.

gbif.citation: Emig, C. C. (2016). Phoronida Database. In O. Bánki, Y. Roskov, M. Döring, G. Ower, L. Vandepitte, D. Hobern, D. Remsen, P. Schalk, R. E. DeWalt, M. Keping, J. Miller, T. Orrell, R. Aalbu, R. Adlard, E. M. Adriaenssens, C. Aedo, E. Aescht, N. Akkari, P. Alfenas-Zerbini, et al., Catalogue of Life Checklist (Feb 2016). https://doi.org/10.48580/dfp3-3c4
